tool.name: oddcomp
tool.description: Find protein sequence regions with a biased composition

param.name: input2
param.label: This is a file in the format of the output produced by 'compseq' that is used to set the minimum frequencies of words in this analysis

param.name: window
param.label: This is the size of window in which to count. Thus if you want to count frequencies in a 40 aa stretch you should enter 40 here

param.name: ignorebz
param.label: The amino acid code B represents Asparagine or Aspartic acid and the code Z represents Glutamine or Glutamic acid. These are not commonly used codes and you may wish not to count words containing them, just noting them in the count of 'Other' words
